title: Economic damage caused by floods in the U.S. 1995 to 2018
summary: Overall Damage in million U.S. dollars has decreased over the Year.

The line rapidly increased by 144.99% from Year 2005 to 2006,increased by 166.51% from Year 2007 to 2008,increased by 274.0% from Year 2009 to 2010,increased by 103.16% from Year 2010 to 2011,decreased by 93.81% from Year 2011 to 2012,increased by 339.68% from Year 2012 to 2013,increased by 296.76% from Year 2015 to 2016,increased by 456.52% from Year 2016 to 2017, and lastly, decreased by 97.29% from Year 2017 to 2018.
The most drastic decrease took place within the Year 2017 and 2018.
The highest Damage in million U.S. dollars, of value 60700.0 was reached at Year 2017
Minimum Damage in million U.S. dollars about 494.0 was reached at Year 2012
min_summary: In general Damage in million U.S. dollars has fallen over the Year.
